mapper.select: SELECT ow.offline_sale_id, ow.store_id, ow.shoes_id, ow.quantity, ow.sale_date, st.store_name, st.store_phone, st.store_address, s.shoes_name, s.shoes_price, s.size, s.shoes_type_id, s.brand_id, t.shoes_type, b.brand_name FROM tbl_offline_sale ow JOIN tbl_store st ON ow.store_id = st.store_id JOIN tbl_shoes s ON ow.shoes_id = s.shoes_id JOIN tbl_shoes_type t ON s.shoes_type_id = t.shoes_type_id JOIN tbl_brand b ON s.brand_id = b.brand_id WHERE ow.store_id = #{storeId} ORDER BY ow.offline_sale_id DESC LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}
